plot outline: The plot revolves around the families of the two friends who, intending to convert their friendship into a relationship, are elated when their children fall in love with each other and eventually marry upon encountering certain familial disputes.
title: Maduveya Mamatheya Kareyole
plot: Kushi and Suraj are childhood friends who are pre-arranged to marry each other by their families, as they must overcome their personal differences.

The plot revolves around the families of the two friends who, intending to convert their friendship into a relationship, are elated when their children fall in love with each other and eventually marry upon encountering certain familial disputes.
